definition: Associated Press (AP)/abbr. for 美國聯合通訊社|美国联合通讯社[Mei3 guo2 Lian2 he2 Tong1 xun4 she4]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
to ally/to unite/to join/(poetry) antithetical couplet

sentences.english: That's according to a new AP Ipsos poll.
sentences.chinese: 這是根據最新的美聯社依普索民意調查得出的結論。

sentences.english: The pictures were given to Associated Press photo editor John Bodkin.
sentences.chinese: 這些照片提供給美聯社照片編輯約翰博德金。

sentences.english: Copies of both notes were obtained by The Associated Press on Monday.
sentences.chinese: 所有備忘錄的副本被美聯社於週一時得到。

sentences.english: AP, Sarah, and Maybelle Carter knew that the economy was very bad.
sentences.chinese: 美聯社，莎拉和梅貝爾卡特知道，經濟非常不景氣。

sentences.english: For the most part the MTV/AP survey of our teens revealed promising, hopeful findings.
sentences.chinese: 音樂電視臺和美聯社的這次調查主給予了我們希望。

sentences.english: Associated Press researcher Ji Chen in Shanghai contributed.
sentences.chinese: 美聯社研究員陳季，於上海。

sentences.english: So what was the headline on an Associated Press analysis of that breakdown in negotiations?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，美聯社對談判決裂新聞分析的標題是什麼？

sentences.english: It also uses AP’s tabulation of voter returns from around the country.
sentences.chinese: 它還利用美聯社製作的全國各地投票人統計表。

sentences.english: At the end of each year, the Associated Press releases a list of the top 10 news stories of the year.
sentences.chinese: 每年底，美聯社都會發布年度十大新聞事件表。

sentences.english: CNN the television network will continue to use The A.P.
sentences.chinese: CNN電視頻道將繼續使用美聯社的資訊內容。

sentences.english: The Associated Press sent a photographer to capture the chicken's many moods.
sentences.chinese: 美聯社則派了一名攝影記者前來抓拍小雞的各種表情。

sentences.english: Associated Press writers Erica Werner, Darlene Superville and Julie Pace contributed to this report.
sentences.chinese: 美聯社記者艾麗卡維爾納，大林和朱莉對此文有貢獻。

sentences.english: Still, the blogosphere will have to tread lightly when it comes to using AP-related sources.
sentences.chinese: 博客圈在使用美聯社內容的時候，還是得悠着點。

sentences.english: Associated Press, other search and rescue team members will give them "on behalf of the class."
sentences.chinese: 美聯社報道，其他搜救隊員將爲他們“代班”。

sentences.english: Copyright 2011 Associated Press. All rights reserved.
sentences.chinese: 版權歸美聯社所有，保留所有權利。

pinyin: Ying1 guo2 Guang3 bo1 Gong1 si1
Bin1 xi1 fa3 ni2 ya4 zhou1

definition: Nikkei Shimbun, Japanese equivalent of Financial Times
pinyin: Ri4 ben3 Jing1 ji4 Xin1 wen2

definition: member of the US House of Representatives
